Episodes.Title: The Year of the Fin
Episodes.Plot: Ike Evans, owner of Miami's most glamorous hotel, needs his 1958 NYE concert to be a smash. He makes a deal with mobster Ben Diamond to ensure success that threatens his life and family.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Feeding Frenzy
Episodes.Plot: Ike Faces the disappearance of Mike Strauss while DA Klein attacks organized crime through Ike's law-student son. Meanwhile, Stevie Evans' affair with Lily Diamond heats up.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Castles Made of Sand
Episodes.Plot: Ike tries to bribe officials to legalize casino gambling. An old friend visits Vera, and Ben wonders if his wife is faithful. Ike contacts his wealthy ex-sister-in-law for a favor.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Atonement
Episodes.Plot: While Ike has to deal with a break in at his hotel, Vera begins planning an extravagant charity function that she hopes Jackie Kennedy will attend. Elsewhere, Victor struggles to get his wife out of Cuba.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Suicide Blonde
Episodes.Plot: Photos of Lily and Stevie become public, while Danny and Mercedes romance grows. Meanwhile, Ike protects Judi from Ben and Vera tries to get pregnant.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: The Harder They Fall
Episodes.Plot: Ben and Ike bet heavily on a boxing match and Vera receives another cancellation from Jackie Kennedy. Meanwhile, Danny receives photos intended for Stevie and the DA makes an important discovery.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Who's The Horse and Who's The Rider?
Episodes.Plot: Things are going badly for Ike: Meg turns down his offer, he is caught lying to Ben and Klein shows him damning evidence. Meanwhile, Stevie's affair comes back to haunt him.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Time and Tide
Episodes.Plot: Lily and Stevie's affair becomes dangerous for them both and Judi finds herself in Klein's hands.. meanwhile, Mercedes and her father receive some bad news.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
